results.content:
It was more like a php learning course, some great php examples and good voice quality.
Bonus php lesson was insufficient for a beginner. Also the examples. If you have no experience in programming you may have some tough time understanding examples.

In the end I enjoyed the course and I like it.
results.content_html:
It was more like a php learning course, some great php examples and good voice quality.
Bonus php lesson was insufficient for a beginner. Also the examples. If you have no experience in programming you may have some tough time understanding examples.

In the end I enjoyed the course and I like it.

results.content: The PHP concepts are explained but the person having no knowledge of PHP, it will be difficult for him/ her to understand it because the installation process is not given & how to run that. In the indexing section , the DB was already created you have not shown how it is created, how you have added arrays of tags. So, need to add proper flow.
results.content_html: The PHP concepts are explained but the person having no knowledge of PHP, it will be difficult for him/ her to understand it because the installation process is not given & how to run that. In the indexing section , the DB was already created you have not shown how it is created, how you have added arrays of tags. So, need to add proper flow.

results.content:
This course offers a very, VERY basic introduction to mongodb. Then it randomly skips to a completely different beginner introduction to PHP with no mention of mongodb whatsoever. 
A simple twitter clone with mongodb and php is promised but never delivered. Instead, we are presented with the previously mentioned PHP introduction, which is made even more puzzling by the fact that PHP knowledge is assumed in the chapter that directly preceeds it.
results.content_html:
This course offers a very, VERY basic introduction to mongodb. Then it randomly skips to a completely different beginner introduction to PHP with no mention of mongodb whatsoever.
A simple twitter clone with mongodb and php is promised but never delivered. Instead, we are presented with the previously mentioned PHP introduction, which is made even more puzzling by the fact that PHP knowledge is assumed in the chapter that directly preceeds it.
